content: What are you waiting for when others are buying and keeping onto Bitcoin investment upon any entry opportunity, before we could go far in discussion, let's take a look at the awesome decision taken by Metaplanet in buying 135,000 worth of bitcoin in their local currency.https://x.com/BitcoinMagazine/status/1894341938871996640?t=ctUCk6NMx2f02YblJBRx_w&s=19This shows that corperate organizations are no more longer interested in keeping their money in banks or holding it for nothing sake, instead they have discovered the massive benefits from bitcoin investment, buying the dip and hold, so what are you still waiting for, this may be another challenge for you to take action in buying to hold before it pumps back, bitcoin always got you covered as long as you're investing to hold.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: The Japanese company is planning to buy 10000 BTC before the end of 2025 and it is on its way there. The company has been buying bitcoin since last year or so and it is still accumulating bitcoin. So any buying opportunity seen by this company will be used to buy bitcoin. Bitcoin fall a little is an encouragement for some people and institutions to buy bitcoin.

comments.body: QuoteMetaplanet (3350) said it bought another 135 bitcoin (BTC) for 1.94 billion yen ($13 million) taking its total holdings to 2,235 BTC and making it one of the top 15 publicly traded companies with the largest bitcoin reserves.From coindeskThis is what a forward thinking organization with proactive leaders who want to take their organizations should do.
